/* name: show_project_status.sql purpose: show project status at db level in a way that is easy to save and compare. This is an important debugging routine. Created: 29-SEP-2005 George J. Carrette */
create procedure show_project_status(@PROJECT_ID CHAR(32)) AS BEGIN DECLARE @WBS_ID CHAR(32) DECLARE @ACTIVITIES TABLE(ID CHAR(32) COLLATE database_default primary key) DECLARE @WBS_ELEMENTS TABLE(ID CHAR(32) COLLATE database_default primary key,level integer,ord integer) DECLARE @LINES TABLE(LINE VARCHAR(1024) COLLATE database_default) DECLARE @S VARCHAR(10) SET @S = ' : '
SET @WBS_ID = (SELECT WBS_ID FROM [PROJECT] WHERE ID = @PROJECT_ID) INSERT @WBS_ELEMENTS SELECT id,level,ord FROM SELECT_WBS_ELEMENTS(@WBS_ID) INSERT @ACTIVITIES SELECT ID FROM SELECT_ACTIVITIES(@WBS_ID)
INSERT @LINES SELECT 'NAME:DATE_START_SCHED:DATE_DUE_SCHED'
INSERT @LINES select SUBSTRING(name,1,20) + @S + CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATE_START_SCHED,101) + @S + CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATE_DUE_SCHED,101) FROM [PROJECT] WHERE ID = @PROJECT_ID
INSERT @LINES SELECT 'Status1:%:Status2:%:Status3:%'
INSERT @LINES select isnull(status_1,'NULL') + @S + convert(char(3),isnull(percent_compl_1,0)) + @S + isnull(status_2,'NULL') + @S + convert(char(3),isnull(percent_compl_2,0)) + @S + isnull(status_3,'NULL') + @S + convert(char(3),isnull(percent_compl_3,0)) FROM [PROJECT] WHERE ID = @PROJECT_ID
INSERT @LINES SELECT 'WBS_NAME:LEVEL:STATUS:%COMP:DURATION:START:DUE'
INSERT @LINES SELECT w1.NAME + @S + CONVERT(CHAR(1),w2.LEVEL) + ',' + CONVERT(CHAR(1),w2.ORD) + @S + isnull(w1.rollup_status,'NULL') + @S + convert(char(3),isnull(w1.rollup_percent_compl,0)) + @S + convert(varchar(10),isnull(rollup_duration,0)) + @S + ISNULL(CONVERT(CHAR(10),ROLLUP_DATE_SCHED_START,101),'') + @S + ISNULL(CONVERT(CHAR(10),ROLLUP_DATE_SCHED_DUE,101),'') from wbs_element w1,@wbs_elements w2 where w1.id = w2.id order by w2.level asc, w2.ord asc
INSERT @LINES SELECT 'NAME:DATE_START_SCHED:DATE_DUE_SCHED:STATUS:STATE:%COMP:DURATION'
INSERT @LINES
SELECT SUBSTRING(NAME,1,20) + @S + ISNULL(CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATE_START_SCHED,101),'') + @S + ISNULL(CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATE_DUE_SCHED,101),'') + @S + ISNULL(STATUS,'') + @S + ISNULL(STATE,'') + @S + CONVERT(CHAR(3),ISNULL(PERCENT_COMPL,0)) + @S + convert(varchar(10),expected_duration) FROM [ACTIVITY2] WHERE ID IN (SELECT ID FROM @ACTIVITIES) ORDER BY DATE_START_SCHED ASC, DATE_DUE_SCHED ASC, NAME ASC
INSERT @LINES SELECT 'NAME:DATE_ES:DATE_EF:DATE_LS:DATE_LF'
insert @lines
SELECT SUBSTRING(NAME,1,20) + @S + ISNULL(CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATE_ES,101),'') + @S + ISNULL(CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATE_EF,101),'') + @S + ISNULL(CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATE_LS,101),'') + @S + ISNULL(CONVERT(CHAR(10),DATE_LF,101),'') FROM [ACTIVITY2] WHERE ID IN (SELECT ID FROM @ACTIVITIES) ORDER BY DATE_START_SCHED ASC, DATE_DUE_SCHED ASC, NAME ASC
select line from @lines
END
